title: Create files to autogeneration CHANGELOG and validate commits

commitUrl.description: Url where the commit history of your project is displayed
commitUrl.x-prompt: Enter url where the commit history of your project is displayed, for example: https://github.com/MikeG96/anxelin-project-structure/commits:

compareUrl.description: Url where the compare history of your project is displayed
compareUrl.x-prompt: Enter url where the compare history of your project is displayed, for example: https://github.com/MikeG96/anxelin-project-structure/compare:
